website_summaries.verdict: A stand so beautiful, they'll almost overlook the cake.
pros: Faux crystal glass beads, hanging accents
Comes in Antique Silver, Antique Gold and Eggplant Purple
cons: Not sturdy enough to hold cake that's more than 2 tiers

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cake stand. I'm pretty sure I could have slapped anything on it and it would have still looked regal. I love the mirror top (who wouldn't like to believe that the cake continued on and on..) and the crystals were fancy yet still simple and pretty. The stand does have some tarnished/gold effect so don't expect it to be shiny silver, but I think it added to the nostalgic antique-y design. Overall it made my dessert look super exciting and gave it that extra touch for entertaining and also looks incredible on top of my cabinet when not in use (especially when the sun catches the crystals!).
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria B

customer_reviews.title: ... husband got this for me for Christmas and I love it. This makes the perfect display for so ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Christmas and I love it. This makes the perfect display for so many cakes and really adds elegance to them. This is by far my favorite cake stand that I own. The beading on it is beautiful. I would definitely only recommend it for one to two teird cakes because it is probably not strong enough to support heavier cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J N

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this - it's simple but elegant. I took the little charms off and used it for a mini cake at my wedding. The only problem was that it was crooked. We had to prop some cardboard under one side to make it more level. Luckily, we were able to do that and it looked okay, but I expected it to be level from the beginning. I will never be using this stand again, nor would I recommend that others buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: LOVESSS IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was on Pintrest trying to find ways in organizing my room and came across the idea of using a cake stand for perfume. So of course I knew I'd find one on amazing but never had I thought I would find one as beautiful as this one. It matched the decor I was going for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, but I thought I was ordering a size that would fit my 10inch cake..It doesn't it fits an 8 inch only. I used a large plate for the cake and put on top of this very pretty, and decorative platter.
customer_reviews.author: miriam eberman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about adding this to my shabby chic kitchen! Disappointed with the discoloration of the metal. Color does not resemble the picture. Pictures show different angles. :( sad
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved it! Put her birthday cake on it and she keeps it now as a vanity decoration in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, But Slightly Crooked
customer_reviews.text: This really is a lovely cake stand for the price. My only complaint is that try as I might, I could not get the platform to be perfectly level. Since I am using this as strictly decor it isn't a tragedy, but I would be pretty annoyed if I were going to be balancing actual cakes on top of it
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hostess!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful! Arrived very quickly!! Makes a gorgeous presentation of cake, fruit platter or anything you put on mirrored top.Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: judith zarug

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE I'VE MADE ON AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I can't rave enough about this cake stand. It transforms even my less-than-stellar cakes into beautiful display pieces. I love this cake stand. It is even more beautiful in person that the pictures portray. The top of the cake stand is actually a mirror. It looks much more expensive than the reasonable price they ask for it. I cannot even count the compliments I've received when taking baked goods to the office or parties. This will make an excellent gift for anyone who loves to bake/entertain.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased with this cake stand. It arrived fast, was packaged beautifully and when opened it just looked lovely. There is a mirror on top which was a bonus for me because I didn't realize there was. The crystal hanging pieces and beading just sparkled and honestly the whole thing looks much more expensive then this price tag. I would recommend this 100%.
customer_reviews.author: AlliMc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cake stand. I love it. When you assemble it just take your time, turn the top over and screw the bottom into the top. Mine was easy to put together and it was straight and even. I am going to use it for my daughter's wedding cake. Seems quite sturdy for a 9 to 10" cake, even with layers.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. Got it for my wedding next year
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Got it for my wedding next year. It will probably be used either for the wedding cake or grooms cake depending on how big a cake we need.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! Using these with the set of three for the perfect wedding cake stands!!
customer_reviews.author: Brady Bunch Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this cake stand - it is a nice addition to my cake stands for showcasing all my finished decorated cakes. It was received fast and packaged well. It's so pretty that I leave sitting out on a shelf when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: KIMMIE

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Although this piece serves as my perfume (and husband's one bottle of Cologne) display, the beads are cheap plastic. Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good look and value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty cake stand. It has the exact look I am going for, and the price was very reasonable. The only criticism I have is that the top is not level. I have a dense two tier cake, and it is visibly tilting. I can correct it by propping one side, but that detracts from the look.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lamarre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this to hold soaps by the sink on the kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Used this at my daughter's bridal shower tea and it looked very elegant. Very heavy and sturdy.....I didn't have to worry about it tipping over. It even came with a spare crystal in case one gets lost or damaged. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: K. Breno

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darned Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My cake stand arrived in excellent condition and I was delighted with how it looked. I haven't used it yet but I know it will have the "oooh and Awe" factor. Great purchase and I may get another!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Instead of using it for desserts I use it to show case my perfumes and have gotten so many compliments on it! Not cheaply made at all.. Really good quality!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cake stand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 10 of these for my granddaughters bridal shower. One on each table with a mini wedding cake. My 1st thought was Muphys Law, at least 2 out of 10 would be damaged. Nope, all 10 were very well packed, in formed styrofoam, in a box, packed in another box. They are sturdy, well made, mirred top, beautiful. Some I looked at in stores were twice the price and not as nice.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this cake stand in a very timely manner. I have to say that it is just beautiful! The crystal details are lovely and were protected in plastic, so nothing was broken or missing. This is for my Wedding cake and it is just the right size for my small cake. The mirror on top is very pretty addition and the photos do not do this justice. I am so happy with my purchase. Thank you!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a small wedding we will be having. the cake is small (enough to feed 100 people) so this is a great size for the cake people to work with. the top of it is a mirror (i dont know if it says this somewhere, i must have missed it) but thats a nice touch (will make the cake look bigger) it comes in 2 parts, easy to put together and is a good strong tight screw on not a cheep push in. Over all im very happy with it - being its under $50 and its pretty as well as strong (well made for the price)

Plan to use it strictly for decoration as it will not stand up to actual use as a cakestand

customer_reviews.title: We both LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy about this!! Got one for me and one for my sister. We both LOVE IT!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used 2 of these for my wedding desserts. They were perfect! I expected them to be of good quality but they were better than expected. I still have them hanging around my house for the next event! It is also nice that the base detaches, makes it easier to store when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jarin Jo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stand, but my daughter's eighteenth birthday party is tomorrow, and one of the strands of crystals are broken. I'm paying $75 for a cake that's going to have to be displayed on a broken platter. It's not the large crystals that hang down, it's one of the strands that does the U shape between them. I don't even see a way to use wire to try to make it work. Very disappointed. If you order this, do it far enough in advance so you have time to exchange it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: M Powers

customer_reviews.title: Fits Standard Size Pie or Cake, Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This cake stand is so beautiful, even better than the photo. The top surface is a mirror. So fancy! It is a good size and fits a standard pie or cake. Very elegant and came packaged securely. It does cost a little more but you absolutely get what you pay for. You will not be disappointed, you will love this cake stand.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it was too small for our wedding cake however that was my fault for not understanding square cake+round cake stand conversion. It's an okay piece but I was thrilled enough with it to try to find one that would fit, it looks a bit tacky and the fake aging on the base just kinda looks dirty. It is pretty but I can't say I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nerva

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cake plate
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son's wedding cake. Perfect size and it was just lovely. The prisms and/or beading could easily be removed if you need something less elaborate. I'm sure it will be used often throughout the years to come. Lovely addition to any festive occasion. Well-made. Worth the money.

It's girly and pretty and sits perfectly. The crystals are big but not gaudy and the just look the beads that drip down. Would definetly make for a great cake stand as I am loving it as a perfume stand!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but for the price I would have liked to see better quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Looking cake stand from afar, but when you see it up close you can see the defects. The stand I received had a broken loop whole (the actual metal was torn thru). The Crystals were not hung equally making it look like there wasn't enough crystal chains to go all around the parameter. The larger crystals are poorly hung, looks like its hung by paper clips. The top mirror portion is not level, giving a crocket appearance once the cake is displayed. I like the stand but pricing is high for the quality. It would be great if the stand came with back up crystals and additional crystal chains so that I could fix it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rejane

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!!! Quick shipping!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for mini cupcakes at a Baby Shower Brunch. It looks very expensive and has the right amount of bling! I wish they had larger sizes to match this one, I would buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent StJean
